name: Nadim Chowdhury
title: Software Developer
about: As a self-learned creative and passionate programmer/developer, I like to build and develop software for any platform. My hobbies are learning, improving skills, solving problems, and adapting to new technologies. I can give my total effort and work well in a team, with responsibility.

responsibilities: Designing and developing end-to-end features across both frontend and backend, ensuring seamless integration between modules and delivering intuitive user experiences.
Optimizing performance, scalability, and security of ERP modules by following industry best practices, clean architecture principles, and robust coding standards.
Maintaining modular and scalable codebases, enabling easier updates, feature enhancements, and long-term system sustainability.
Developed a full-stack flight booking system utilizing real-time data from the Amadeus GDS API.
Integrated a Stripe payment system and implemented interactive maps for seamless airport selection.

Architecture & Performance: Implemented clean, scalable architecture, including a flexible component registry, real-time rendering engine, and smooth drag-and-drop functionality with undo/redo support.
Developing a drag-and-drop website builder similar to Wix and Google Sites, with multi-tenancy architecture and subdomain publishing functionality.
Contributed to a multi-tenancy event management web app builder with subdomain publishing support.
Collaborated on in-house projects by designing multiple UI pages and implementing robust API integrations.
Implemented CRUD operations for the Profile Page with role-based access control.
Developed Back Office and Task management functionalities with CRUD actions for multiple roles.
Designed Customer Order management features with delivery and pick-up preferences.
Developed frontend solutions for projects including a School Management System in Angular.
Built a fully functional Flight Ticket Booking website in MERN stack.
Created dynamic, intuitive UIs leveraging real-time data for enhanced user experience.
